answers.answer: Congratulations on getting to go home!!  The longest I've been in the hospital was a week, and I hated it!  I can't imagine having to stay there, especially all by yourself with no contact with the nurses, for more than 5 weeks!!!    Congrats again!!!
Good for you and the little one! It is always nicer to be home.
Congrats on everything. Glad things are going well and that you will get to spend some time at home. :)
Yeaaa... glad to hear you are home!  I am sure that your spirit will be brighter being at home, too :)
I'm so glad you're home!  Congratulations!!!
YAYYYY! I know your sooo glad to be going home! You will be much more comfortable... I am so glad all is well with you and baby! Just try and stay off your feet at home too! :-)
Congrats.  I am sure you are glad to be home.  Just being in your own bed has to be better, right?  Well rest up, you won't get it soon!!

question: So after 5 long weeks of hospital bed rest i finally got home last night!!!!!!!! I am still on bedrest, only allowed up to pee and shower until i reach 34 weeks. The Dr was going to keep me in the hospital and move me to independent stay. i was still going to be on bedrest, but i would not have nurse care.I didn't think i could handle that. it was getting harder and harder being there and the thought of not even seeing a nurse throughout the day was too much. So she did the ultrasound (aftger saying she would have to postpone until the next day, but when a spot came up she did me since my mom was there)When she finished with a tv u/s and my cervix had stayed the same she said "i guess you're going home"!!!!! I live about 1 hour away from that hospital, so if i go into labour before 36 weeks i have to go there, after 36 i an deliever at my local hospitalMy ges. diabetes is being controlled pretty well. i do have to keep adjusting my insullin being on bedrest and all, makes it harder to control. and the baby is right on track with size/weight (45th precentile) which makes me happy because i was worried about him getting to big.
